page.title: 20FUTURE DEVELOPMENT
page.content: This area has limited potential for large scale development in the future. It is restricted by several factors such as it's natural boundaries-the canal and the riverTrent;it is not located in an area with any natural resources which are in great demand; plus the fact that it's development must have been hampered by it's close proximity to the two important cities of Derby and Nottingham. Because it is a very picturesque place of some historical interest it could make a contribution to the local tourist industry,any other commercial or industrial development is unlikely. Infact, the area will probably remain unchanged for many years to come,thus maintaining it's rural character and culture.
